How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?

Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to play?
yes
sweet! i'm at the starting point
got a twig to my left leading to a tiny island with a tiger. where to from here?
from there you go to your right onto another twig which leads to a map
got it, pal! so i'm on the next island with a butterfly
what's next?
after the butterfly and the tiger there should be an island with the map on it, which could be the end point
i think there's a bit of confusion. i'm on the butterfly island after the tiger
but there's no island with a map mentioned on my map! there's parrot island south-west of the tiger and a big island with an elephant left of the parrot. which one should i head to?
you should try to head north, if you are able to find any other island in that diretion
sorry mate, heading north from the butterfly isn't part of the map description
seems like the choices are to go south-west to parrot island or left to another large island with an elephant. which one?
try the parrot island
alrighty, so here i am on parrot island! there’s an elephant hanging out on the left and there are 3 rocks to the south-east which lead to a new island with a frog
which way do i go next?
try to go on the frog island
all good, i'm on the frog island now! i note there's a croc to the left, and a big island with the same elephant left to the croc
else, i could continue onto the frog's island. where to next?
and then there should be an alligator area after you get to the frog island
alright, on my way to the croc alligator area! made it
i see a big ol' elephant on an island to my left. what's the next step, boss?
after croc area you should see some rocks which then lead to a snake area
i think something's off
i couldn't see any rocks from here. but i could go left back to an island with the elephant on it, from where i could go west to a giraffe or south east to a snake, should i get back to the elephant?
by the rocks there should be a giraffe
so i'm gonna head back to the elephant then go west to the giraffe, right?
yes, but make sure you get to the snake
gotcha! so i'm back at the elephant, now heading southeast to the snake
and made it to the snake! what's next?
after the snake you go east and should find something
ok, took two steps east from the snake and guess what? it's the treasure! we've made it! *finished*

chat.msg: hey!!! ya comenzamos?
where do i go first
hey! start by taking a few steps to your left, just below the nearby wooden bench. then cross that trail just in front of you
here comes the tricky bit - make a quick u-turn, like a 180 degrees type of thing. cross the trail again and then head back towards our lovely white dog. what a great start!
found the white dog
what now
fantastic! now, cross over that branch to the south. just keep heading downwards
you'll spot another white dog. it's having a picnic, isn't that cute?
now you need to stroll over that picnic mat and touch the bowl of berries
then head west. having fun yet?
i  touched the bowl of berries now
awesome! see that wooden branch up ahead? you're going to cross the river again, but this time head to the north
watch your step!
crossed the river now
great job! now, you see that green bush over there? do not touch it! go around it from the right side until you reach the florist stand
got it?
reached the florist stand
perfect! now take a left turn - you're gonna head west, passing under the stand
you'll soon reach a big bridge with bicyclists on it. keep walking!
crossed the bridge now
nice work! now, just past the bridge, take a look
see those two elderly folks reading newspapers on a bench? walk towards them!
i am right next to them now
fantastic! now, head south a few steps - right between the old folks and that wooden branch you see over there
okay i went south a bit
you're doing awesome! now, there's a green bush next to the end of the wooden branch
head towards it
i am at the green bush, where to next
good job! now go east - it's the direction between the branch and the bush
i see this branch next to a deer
awesome! that's exactly where you needed to be
great job, mate! you navigated like a pro! now go pet that deer. just kidding - enjoy the view, you've earned it

chat.msg: hey there, estas listo?
where are you starting from
starting from the tent up north
where to next, friend?
go south in the direction of the dog, and when you see the dog curve slightly under it going east towards the fire
alrighty! i've moved south past the dog, now i'm at the fire
what's the next move, buddy?
right now go over the fire, and then make a path going under the mushroom until you get to the blue car, but do not touch the car
sure thing, mate! walked around the fire, took a path under the mushroom and now i'm near the blue car
don't worry, didn't touch it! what's next?
after the blue car you go southwest under the bush until you hit a telescope
made it to the telescope, buddy! it's pretty cool
where to now?
under the telescope you go to the left of the bush, and then go under the rock area
okay, done! left the telescope, went to the left of the bush, and now i'm under the rock area
now from the rock area go left into the house
done and dusted, mate! just made it into the house
*finished* what a fun adventure! where are we going next?

chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
where to now
let's start! head southwest under the first palm tree
turn right at the second tree and then a quick left before the third one. you're gonna go straight south from there
okay after going south what now
nice! now you see that adorable brown puppy? go left around the pup and then turn southward again
you're doing great!
after the puppy where do i go
alrighty, carry on till you're between a big rock on your left and a small rock on your right
you'll see water in front of you. got it?
i am at the water
awesome! now look for a massive red crab in the water and head towards it
once you reach, turn right. stay in the water and moving along the big rock, heading west
i am close to a shark now
perfect! make a sharp right at the shark but don't worry, he's harmless
keep going!
where to now
just ahead there's land
cross between the medium rock and a colorful ball to get to it. continue north after that
i crossed tgeball now
you're doing awesome! move a bit to the left and head northwest, squeeze between a red tent and a large speaker
i am at the speaker now
well done! now, make an arc around the tent and head south after that
i am next to a rock now
great! look for a red kayak ahead
i am at the kayak
look for a small green bush to your north, and head there
trust me, it's not far now!
i am at the bush
yay! high five! you've navigated like a pro
that was fun, wasn’t it?

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: I think it shows more intelligence

general_survey.answer: I have a native speaker fluency in both languages
